html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2018-13012018-10-22,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  PCH
ActNational Capital Act
SubjectAcquisition of property ** NCC **
PrecisOrder authorizing the NATIONAL CAPITAL COMMISSION (NCC) to acquire approximately 3,240 square metres of land from HYDRO OTTAWA LIMITED (HOL) for the purpose of establishing a shared access road from Hunt Club Road to the National Capital Commission property at 4120 Russell Road, Ottawa, and authorize the NCC to grant an easement in perpetuity to Hydro Ottawa Limited over approximately 896 square metres of this land to permit Hydro Ottawa Limited to access an adjacent property from Hunt Club Road.
RegistrationRegistration: UNR/
AttachmentsAttachment
